popover.primary: A mastery path focused on long range bow combat
A mastery path focused on toe-to-toe combat
A mastery path focused on short range and moving bow combat

data.name: Yer Bleedin'!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 910 damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: What Blocka?
data.description: An attack which deals 291 damage and reduces your target's armor by 990 and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Git Em!
data.description: You and your Squig attack together on each others target. You strike your target for 119 damage, and your pet strikes its target for 119 damage.  If you are within 35 feet of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy for 119 damage, and likewise, if your pet is within 35 feet of your target, it will also strike your enemy for 119 damage as well.

data.name: Stop Runnin!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 253 damage and snares your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.  This ability will continue to build up if you move.

data.name: Run 'n Shoot
data.description: Deals 216 damage to your target.  This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Don't Eat Me
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Farty Squig
data.description: You cause your pet to explode, dealing 419 damage to enemies within 30 feet.  For the next 10 seconds, the next different squig other than the one that just exploded will be summoned instantly.

data.name: Cut Ya!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 690 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Horned Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Horned squig pet which you can order around. This pet deals more damage than a basic squig. It is strong against physical attacks, but weak against magic.
This pet receives a bonus to Strength equal to your bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Toughness and Wounds that is 50% of your bonus from items.
Your range is increased by 10% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Gore
data.description: Your Squig gores its target, dealing 209 damage and an additional 135 damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Squig Armor
data.description:
Summons a massive battle squig which will promptly eat you. From within the battle squig, you can poke and prod it to move it around and make it attack.
While in your Squig Armor; your Ballistic Skill from items also counts as Strength, your Ranged Power from items also counts as Melee Power, and your Ranged Critical chance from items also counts as Melee Critical chance.

data.name: Ard Noggin
data.description: A powerful attack that deals 231 damage and reduces the threat generated by your pet's next attack.

data.name: Gas Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Gas squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range, but is very weak to attacks.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill equal to your bonus from items.
Your armor is increased by the amount of armor gained from items as long as your Squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Goop Shootin'
data.description: Your Squig sprays out corrosive slime towards an enemy, dealing 265 damage to all targets within 20 feet of the victim.

data.name: Squig Frenzy
data.description: You whip your pet in to a frenzy, causing it to do 50% more auto attack damage for 30 seconds.

data.name: Spiked Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Spiked squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range and has increased damage.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill equal to 150% of your bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Weapon Skill equal to 50% of your bonus from items.
You gain the ability to autoattack while moving, and your chance to critically hit is increased by 5% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Poisoned Spine
data.description: Your Squig injects a deadly poison in to it's target, dealing 300 damage over 5 seconds and reducing their chance to critically hit by  10% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Sticky Squigz
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet become snared, reducing movement speed by 40% for the next 10 seconds. You are knocked back away from your enemies.

data.name: Explodin' Arrer
data.description: An Ailment which deals 183 Elemental damage to your target and then explodes, dealing an additional 231 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Lots o' Arrers
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 3 seconds, repeatedly shooting them for 134 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Spine Fling
data.description: Your Squig flings deadly spines at it's target, dealing 178 damage every second for 3 seconds.

data.name: Not So Fast!
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals 253 damage and reduces your target's Initiative by 80 for 10 seconds.  This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Spore Cloud
data.description: Your Squig expels noxious spores towards an enemy, briefly sickening the victim and all other enemies within 30 feet of them, dealing 314 damage. Any of your Squigs, including your Battle Squig, within the radius will be healed for 178 health.

data.name: Tastes Like Chicken
data.description: You eat your squig, gaining 441 health. For the next 10 seconds, the next different squig other than the one that was just eaten will be summoned instantly.

data.name: Big Claw
data.description: You force your Battle Squig to claw at your target, dealing 432 damage over 9 seconds and snaring them by 40% over 9 seconds.

data.name: Head Butt
data.description: Your Squig slams it's head in to it's target, dealing 156 damage and knocking them back.

data.name: Death From Above
data.description: Your Squig bounces on it's target dealing 119 damage, and knocking them down for 2 seconds.

data.name: Drop That!!
data.description: On the Squig's next attack, it will deal an additional 269 damage and disarm your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Don't Hit Me!
data.description: You lash out at your target, dealing 231 damage and interrupting any ability that they are building up.

data.name: Bounce
data.description: You cause your Battle Squig to bounce, dealing 231 damage and knocking your target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Choking Arrer
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals 328 damage and silences your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Shoot Thru Ya
data.description: A piercing arrow which deals 319 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.  This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: KABOOM!
data.description: Your Battle Squig explodes, causing you to be launched upward out of your Squiggy armor. All enemies within 10 feet take 441 damage and are knocked back.

data.name: Sharp Toofs
data.description: Git Em!'s damage is increased to 419 on your pet's first attack, and its cost is reduced by 15 Action Points.

data.name: He's A Biggun'
data.description: Your summoned Squig's Strength and Toughness are increased by 160

data.name: Strength In Numbas
data.description:
Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet of you hits an enemy, there is a 25% chance that you will regain 100 points of Morale over 3 seconds.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: All By Meself
data.description: You deal 25% more damage when you have no pets present.

data.name: Pick On Yer Own Size
data.description: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by 120, but reduces your Toughness by 120.

data.name: Sharpened Arrers
data.description: Explodin Arrer now deals 258 damage to the initial enemy, and 627 damage over 9 seconds with its explosion.

data.name: I Got Lots
data.description: Your Squig pets no longer have cooldown times.

data.name: Da Smell Don't Bother Me
data.description: While in your Squig Armor, you are healed for 120 health every 5-seconds.

data.name: Empowered Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_1: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Eternal Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_2: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Infinite Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_3: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Augment Vigor
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: Soothin' Mushroom Wrap
data.description: While within 100 feet of you, your group member's actions cost 50% less AP for 10 seconds.

data.name: Squig Goo
data.description: Targeted AE attack that deals 900 over 9 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet, and snares the targets by 60%.

data.name: Squigbeast
data.description: Pet Buff. Triples pet damage output and increases the size of your pet for 15 seconds.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Increases your Ballistic Skill by 160

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to block, dodge, and parry will be reduced by 15% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Unshakable Focus
data.description: A cold unyielding focus causes all your attacks to deal 100% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Whazat Behind You?!
data.description:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will Detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 75% damage to you for 5 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Too Smart For Dat
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: RUN AWAY!
data.description: Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Stabbity
data.description: Deals 231 damage to your target.

data.name: Plink
data.description: A well aimed arrow that deals 436 damage.

data.name: Summon Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a basic squig pet which you can order around. This pet is very tough, and can take quite beating.
This pet receives a bonuses to Toughness and Wounds equal to your bonus from items.
This squig generates much more hatred in enemy monsters than normal.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Aimin' Quickly
data.description: Plink now builds up 1 seconds faster, but the cost is increased by 20 Action Points.

data.name: Shrapnel Arrer
data.description: On contact, your arrow explodes in to shrapnel, dealing 178 damage to your target and reduces range on their abilities to 75% for the next 3 seconds.

data.name: I Feelz Yer Pain
data.description:
Any time you critically hit with a Path of Big Shootin' ability, you will regain 50 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Poison Arrer
data.description: Deals 733 Corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Clever Shootin'
data.description: All of your Path of Big Shootin' abilities cost 35% fewer action points.

data.name: Finish 'em Off
data.description: Deals 816 damage if your target is below 20% hit points, or 365 damage otherwise.

data.name: Lots Of Shootin'
data.description: Deals 2400 damage to all targets within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: 'Ere, Squiggy!
data.description: When you are dealt damage, there is a 25% chance that 50% of the damage is dealt to your Squig, if it is within 45 feet.

data.name: Indigestion
data.description: You prod the inside of your Battle Squig, causing it to deal 260 Corporeal damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Sneaky Stabbin
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Bad Gas!
data.description: You expel noxious fumes, increasing the cooldowns of enemies within 30 feet by 5 seconds for 10 seconds and dealing 95 damage to all affected enemies.

data.name: Clever Stabbin'
data.description: All of your Path of Big Stabbin' abilities cost 35% fewer action points.

data.name: Big Bouncin!
data.description: You force your Battle Squig to bounce in the air for up to 3 seconds, repeatedly dealing 156 damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Wind Up Da Waaagh
data.description: Deals 2400 damage to all targets within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Splinterin' Arrers
data.description: Run 'N Shoot will now also damage all enemies within 20 feet of your target, but damage is reduced by 30%.

data.name: Run Away!
data.description: You command your Squig to Taunt all enemies within 30 feet and increases your movement speed by 30 % for 10 seconds.

data.name: Da Waaagh Iz Strong
data.description: Increases durations of Yer Bleeding to 24s, Stop Runnin to 15s, and Not So Fast! to 15s.

data.name: Rotten Arrer
data.description: An Ailment which deals 627 damage to your target over 9 seconds and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker. Only usable on a target that is already Ailing.

data.name: Shootin' Wif Da Wind
data.description: Increases the ranges of all Path of Quick Shootin' abilities by 50%.

data.name: Behind Ya!
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: A sneaky bow shot which deals 403 damage to the target.

data.name: Arrer O' Mork
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all targets in front of you within 40 feet, and then deals an additional 1200 over 10 seconds.
